pages.text: I have removed many of the default keybindings to allow you to customize them to your liking and gameplay. $(br2)Why have so many keys tied to Mekanism's armor if I'm not going to wear the armor.$(br2)I have set the settings for JourneyMap and JEI and I highly advised setting the keybindings for mods as you need them.

pages.title: Keybindings
pages.text: Keybindings are set my hitting $(thing)ESC$() then selecting $(thing)Options$() then $(thing)Controls$(). To set a keybinding, click the button next to the action. The next button you press will be what it binds that action to. $(br2)I suggest adding keybindings to AoA3 and Corail Tombstone (GRAVE key is a nice one for Tombstone!!)
